Metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10906 affecting package fuse for versions less than 2.9.7-10
Metadata.Description: CVE-2018-10906 affecting package fuse for versions less than 2.9.7-10. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package fuse is earlier than 2.9.7-10, affected by CVE-2018-10906
